mapper.select: SELECT t1.ID, t1.`CODE`, t1.`NAME`, t1.DES, t1.TYPE, t1.ICON, t1.CATEGORY_ID, t1.EDIT_ID, t1.PUBLISH_ID, t1.IS_PUBLIC, t1.HAVE_NAV, t1.CREATE_USER, t1.CREATE_DATE, t1.MODIFIED_DATE, t1.MODIFIED_USER FROM ( SELECT rd.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM bi_ui_analyse_page WHERE CATEGORY_ID IS NOT NULL ) rd, ( SELECT @pid := #{rootPageId} ) pd WHERE FIND_IN_SET( CATEGORY_ID, @pid ) > 0 AND @pid := concat( @pid, ',', id ) UNION SELECT * FROM bi_ui_analyse_page WHERE FIND_IN_SET( id, @pid ) > 0 ) t1 WHERE t1.IS_EDIT ='N' ORDER BY t1.ID
